q: Brenda Harvill, 60, of Detroit, said the commercial gave her community`` a new image as a comeback city.''`` We were down for a while,'' she acknowledged. But guess what? We're back. I Roy didn't want to be overaggressive. I Roy just wanted to let my teammates do what they had to do early in the game because they( Grizzlies) were taking away some of the shots I Roy wanted by zoning up. My teammates held the fort, and then when I Roy got an opportunity, I Roy just tried to make the best of it. Allen Iverson made 10-of-24 shots, including 4-of-7 3-pointers.
